newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korean soldier opens fire, injures nine others.
newsitem.headline: S.Korean soldier opens fire, injures nine others.

text.p: A South Korean army private opened fire at random on Sunday and wounded nine soldiers before deserting from his barracks near the inter-Korean border, a defence ministry spokesman said.
The spokesman said Kim Hee-yong, armed with a rifle and dozens of rounds of ammunition, was still at large.
He said several of the soldiers attacked by the deserter were wounded seriously and rushed to a military hospital.
But Yonhap news agency said Kim also threw two grenades into a kitchen and barracks at his unit located south of the eastern border area before he fled to a nearby minefield.
